Ip:
mc.triumphmc.beastnode.net
TriumphMc is unlike any faction server you have ever played before. To succeed here will take skill, strategy and a little bit of luck. You will be raided, and you will die. You will need to make alliances, without people to have your back you will not stand a chance.
CUSTOM MADE TERRAIN NOW FEATURING THE FAMOUS MOUNTAINS OF 1.2 SEED GARGAMEL!
Think you can handle it?
We Won't Bore You With The Details Just Yet, Get In And Get Raiding! Ip: mc.triumphmc.beastnode.net
